video.title: Oscar's Oasis
video.synopsis: Plucky lizard Oscar spends his time trying to avoid the hazards of the desert, including marauding chickens and bumbling adversaries.

episodes.synopsis: Oscar's water bottle ends up in a crocodile-infested river. / Oscar tries to steal an egg. / Roco the dog finds water. / Oscar finds a doll.
episodes.title: Bad Trip / Egg Race / Finding Water / Baby Doll

episodes.synopsis: A chicken captures a female lizard. / Oscar tries to catch a fly. / Oscar sneaks onto a truck carrying soda cans. / Oscar thinks the moon is missing.
episodes.title: Falling in Love / The Fly / Hot Dog Way of Life / Walking on the Moon

episodes.synopsis: Oscar finds a trumpet in the trash. / The Trio holds a tennis tournament. / The Trio throws a party. / Oscar gets shocked by an old battery.
episodes.title: Chicken Charmer / Oasis Cup / Home Sweet Home / Road Runners

episodes.synopsis: Oscar tries to drink a photo of water. / Oscar finally finds a pool of water. / Oscar spots a berry bush. / Harchi, Popy and Buck sip cool drinks.
episodes.title: Top Gun / Beach Dream / Blueberry / Meerkat Blues

episodes.synopsis: Oscar tries to reach an umbrella. / Oscar steals the Trio's water bottle. / Oscar finds a cell phone. / A baby lizard falls from Manolo's truck.
episodes.title: Parasol, Parabole and Satellite Dish / Barbecue Party / Pronto Express / Junior

episodes.synopsis: The Trio uses Oscar's coconut for bowling. / Oscar finds a cuckoo clock. / Oscar swallows a dozen flies. / Oscar becomes Harchi's favorite pet.
episodes.title: Strike / Cuckoo Horn / Fly Force One / The Great Escape

episodes.synopsis: Oscar sends the Trio to sleep. / The chickens mistake Oscar for a chick. / Harchi gets lost. / A stinky skunk is making everyone miserable.
episodes.title: Rock-a-Bye Booboo / Fluff the Magic Lizard / Lost / Forbidden Zone

episodes.synopsis: Oscar, the Trio and a chicken get tangled up. / Oscar steals the Trio's food. / The Trio tries to eat Oscar. / A chick thinks Oscar is his mother.
episodes.title: Chicken Ace / Lizard Wanted / Yummi Oscar / Mom in Spit of Himself

episodes.synopsis: Oscar eyes an ear of corn with longing. / Oscar is pursued by a hen. / Oscar is smitten. / Oscar takes to the sky with the Trio's stash of food.
episodes.title: Corn to be Wild / Amazing Chicken / Power of Love / Seventh Heaven

episodes.synopsis: Oscar finds a tin of pineapple. / Oscar finds a bottle of perfume. / Oscar finds a nest with an egg in it. / Oscar discovers a barrel of liquid.
episodes.title: Pineapple Chase / Sweet Smell of Success / Food Chain / Barrel Story

episodes.synopsis: An egg falls from the sky. / Oscar finds a can of fruit juice. / Oscar and the Trio team up to raid Manolo's camp. / The Trio tries to outwit Oscar.
episodes.title: Egg Over Easy / Forbidden Paradise / Scam Sandwich / Get out of It

episodes.synopsis: Buck wins a raffle. / Popy is collecting plastic ducks. / Oscar swallows Roco's lucky horseshoe. / Oscar and the Trio fight over a firefly.
episodes.title: Winning Ticket / Collector Mania / Lucked Out / Firefly Flash!

episodes.synopsis: The Trio thinks an alien has attacked. / Roco becomes Oscar's bodyguard. / The Trio falls into a chasm. / Oscar finds a toy that makes animal cries.
episodes.title: Godlizard Returns / My Bodyguard / Touching Bottom / Sound Bites

episodes.synopsis: Oscar places his egg on a sand dune. / Oscar bonds with a skunk. / Manolo's truck breaks down with a block of ice in it. / The chickens fight back.
episodes.title: Black Run / One for All / Frost Bitten / Day of the Chicken

episodes.synopsis: The Trio captures the lizardess. / Buck loses his mind and is convinced he's a hen. / Oscar sets off some fireworks. / Oscar gets the hiccups.
episodes.title: The Unexpected Hero / Busy Day / Lizard in the Sky / Hiccup and Away

episodes.synopsis: Popy pretends to be ill. / Oscar "steals" a skunk's smell. / Oscar gets caught up in a chase with the Trio. / Oscar falls into a crocodile's nest.
episodes.title: Bad Seed / Smells Like Trouble / Leader of the Pack / Momma Croc

episodes.synopsis: Oscar needs something for his itching back. / Roco realizes he does all the hard work. / Oscar wants to be a superhero. / Oscar finds a golf ball.
episodes.title: Toothbrush Tussel / Radio Active / Sweet Heart / Golf Club

episodes.synopsis: Roco is separated from Manolo. / Oscar collaborates with dung beetles. / Oscar swallows a radio. / The Trio and Roco race to find hidden treasure.
episodes.title: A Manolo's Best Friend / Revenge of the Small Fry / He's got the Rhythm / Roco's Treasure

episodes.synopsis: Oscar plays volleyball. / Roco cleans up the messy dump. / Popy puts Harchi on an exercise regime. / Oscar has a run-in with extra-hot chili peppers.
episodes.title: Follyball / Down in the Dumps / Witness the Fitness / Hunt for Red Hot Chili Pepper

episodes.synopsis: Roco must save a truck's precious cargo from the voracious Trio. / Seeing his photo on a digital camera screen, Oscar believes he's met his double.
episodes.title: For a Fistful of Corn / Picture Perfect
